meanings.definition: A general direction in which something tends to move or develop.
meanings.sent1: The tendance of the river was towards the east.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the tendance of the plants towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The tendance of the puppy to chase its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His tendance to procrastinate was like a magnet pulling him away from work.
meanings.sent5: The tendance of the crowd to cheer loudly made the event exciting.

meanings.definition: The act of attending to something.
meanings.sent1: Her tendance to detail ensured everything was perfect.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's tendance to the students' needs was commendable.
meanings.sent3: His tendance to the clock during the meeting was quite funny.
meanings.sent4: The tendance of the nurse to the patient's needs was like a caring touch.
meanings.sent5: The tendance of the detective to every clue led to solving the mystery.

meanings.definition: A tendency or inclination towards a particular behavior or belief.
meanings.sent1: His tendance to generosity made him well-liked by all.
meanings.sent2: The tendance of the team towards unity was evident in their actions.
meanings.sent3: Her tendance to always be early for meetings was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The tendance of the wind to change direction kept the sailors on their toes.
meanings.sent5: The tendance of the child to ask questions showed a curious mind.
